Dependencies

Ruby

Download and install instructions in https://www.ruby-lang.org/

Sass (v3.3.14)

$sudo gem install sass -v 3.3.14

Node

Download and install instructions in this page http://nodejs.org/

Gulp

$npm install gulp -g

Install

Clone the project

$git clone git@github.com:frontendler/frontendler.git

Install project dependencies

$npm install

Run Frontendler

Watch

$gulp watch

Build

$gulp build

Frontendlersource codeissues
